::Battera::
"Yes I'm a flyer.  I'm a bat.  I fly, it's what I do."
She smirked.  "Sorry, I let my sarcasm get to me once in a while."
She wondered what she would do with a tank mode.
"So it will turn me into a tank and I still get to keep my beast mode?"
